description: Fittonia 'White Nerve' has beautiful white veins running through dark green leaves. It’s a vibrant addition to any room.

name: Sansevieria trifasciata 'Black Gold'
description: Sansevieria 'Black Gold' has dark green and yellow striped leaves. It’s a resilient plant that thrives on neglect.

name: Polystichum tsus-simense 'Korean Rock Fern'
description: Polystichum 'Korean Rock Fern' has delicate, feathery fronds. It’s perfect for shaded spots in your home.

name: Lithops salicola 'Bacchus'
description: Lithops 'Bacchus' is a unique succulent that resembles small stones. It’s a perfect plant for dry, sunny spots.

name: Adenium ( Grown through seeds, Mix Color ) – Plant
description: A beautiful flowering plant, grown from seeds with a mix of vibrant colors. Ideal for gardens and pots.

name: Adenium (White) Plant
description: Elegant white flowers that brighten up any space. A perfect addition to your collection of flowering.

name: Aptenia, Heartleaf Ice Plant
description: A low-maintenance plant with succulent heart-shaped leaves, perfect for sunny spots and decorative pots.

name: Bel Tree, Bilva Patra, Bel Patra ( Grown through seeds ) – Plant
description: This plant is known for its medicinal properties. Ideal for religious and medicinal purposes.

name: Bird of Paradise – Plant
description: A striking plant with large, tropical flowers resembling a bird's head, adding a touch of the exotic to your garden.

name: Bougainvillea (Pink) – Plant
description: A vibrant and hardy plant that brings a burst of pink color to your garden throughout the year.

name: Bougainvillea Dwarf (Pink) Plant
description: A compact version of the traditional Bougainvillea, perfect for small spaces or container gardening.

name: Bryophyllum, Panfuti – Plant
description: A hardy plant with beautiful flowers, known for its medicinal and ornamental qualities.

name: Clitoria Tarnatea, Gokarna (Blue) Plant
description: A stunning blue flower plant that can be grown easily in any garden or as an ornamental plant in containers.

name: Damascus, Scented Rose – Plant
description: A fragrant and beautiful rose that adds charm and elegance to any garden or home decor.

name: Fluorescent Freesia
description: A colorful and fragrant flower that blooms in a variety of hues, perfect for adding vibrance to your garden.

name: Gardenia Dwarf, Ananta Dwarf – Plant
description: A small, fragrant flowering plant that thrives in pots or small garden spaces, perfect for brightening up any corner.

name: Anjeer, Common fig Plant
description: The Common Fig plant produces sweet, nutrient-rich fruit. It grows well in both tropical and temperate climates.

name: Annona Squamosa, Sita Phal ( Grown through seeds ) – Plant
description: Sita Phal, also known as Custard Apple, is a tropical fruit with creamy pulp. Grown from seeds, it thrives in warm climates.

name: Annona Squamosa, Sita Phal (Grafted) Plant
description: This grafted Sita Phal plant produces fruit faster than seed-grown ones, offering a delicious tropical fruit for your garden.

name: Banana – G9, Kela – Plant
description: G9 Banana plants yield large, sweet bananas in a short amount of time. Ideal for small gardens or containers.

name: Morus, Shahtoot, Mulberry (Small Leaves)
description: Mulberry plants produce sweet berries that are perfect for making jams, pies, or enjoying fresh. This variety has small leaves.

name: Ornamental Orange (Green Leaves) Plant
description: The Ornamental Orange tree produces small decorative fruits and brightens up any garden with its vibrant green leaves.

name: Pomegranate, Annar, Anar – Plant
description: Pomegranate plants produce delicious, tangy fruit with numerous health benefits. Ideal for tropical and subtropical climates.

name: Aloe Vera Plant
description: Aloe Vera is known for its soothing and healing properties. It requires minimal care and can thrive indoors.

name: Amla (Big Fruit, Grown through seeds) – Plant
description: Amla, or Indian Gooseberry, is rich in Vitamin C. This plant is great for immunity and overall health.

name: Ashwagandha – Plant
description: Ashwagandha is widely used for stress relief and improving stamina. It is easy to grow and low-maintenance.

name: Bel Tree, Bilva Patra, Bel Patra (Grown through seeds) – Plant
description: The Bel Tree is sacred in Hindu culture and used in traditional medicine. Its leaves are beneficial for health.

name: Citronella, Odomas – Plant
description: Citronella is a natural mosquito repellent and has a pleasant aroma. It grows well in sunny areas.

name: Cloves Plant
description: Clove plants are valued for their aromatic flower buds used in spices. The plant has medicinal benefits too.

name: Costus Igneus, Insulin – Plant
description: Commonly known as the 'Insulin Plant,' it is beneficial for managing blood sugar levels. Easy to grow at home.

name: Curry Leaves, Kadi Patta, Murraya koenigii, Meetha Neem – Plant
description: Curry Leaves add flavor to dishes and are rich in nutrients. It’s a staple plant in Indian kitchens.

name: Ixora Long, Singapuri Ixora (Pink) Plant
description: The Ixora plant is known for its beautiful pink flowers. It also has antioxidant properties and adds beauty to gardens.

name: Juhi, Jasminum Auriculatum – Plant
description: Juhi is a fragrant jasmine plant used in Ayurvedic treatments. Its flowers are used for aroma therapy and decoration.

name: Krishna Tulsi, Tulsi (Black) – Plant
description: Krishna Tulsi is a variety of holy basil known for immunity-boosting benefits. It’s a revered plant in Hindu culture.

name: Lemon Grass – Plant
description: Lemongrass is a fragrant herb used in teas and cuisine. It has calming properties and repels insects naturally.

name: MYRTILLOCACTUS GEOMETRIZANS F. CRISTATA 'DINOSAUR BACK'
description1: Known for its unique, wavy, dinosaur-like crest shape, this cactus adds an exotic look.
description2: Perfect for indoor decor and low-maintenance plant collections.

name: ECHINOPSIS SUBDENUDATA 'DOMINOS'
description1: This cactus features white speckled spots resembling domino patterns.
description2: Known for its night-blooming flowers with a soft fragrance.

name: ECHINOPSIS ANCISTROPHORA SSP. ARACHNACANTHA
description1: Small cactus with dense, spider-like spines, ideal for compact spaces.
description2: Produces stunning, colorful blooms during the growing season.

name: OPUNTIA RUFIDA F. MONSTROSA 'MINI CINNAMON CACTUS'
description1: This mini cactus has unique cinnamon-colored spines, giving it a warm appearance.
description2: Popular for its small size and eye-catching color in succulent arrangements.

name: MAMMILLARIA SCHWARZII
description1: Compact cactus with dense spines and delicate pink flowers.
description2: A low-maintenance option for sunny windowsills or rock gardens.

name: MAMMILLARIA BOMBYCINA 'SILKEN PINCUSHION'
description1: Features soft, hair-like spines that resemble a silken pincushion.
description2: Ideal for cactus enthusiasts who appreciate unique textures.

name: GYMNOCALYCIUM MIHANOVICHII 'GRAFTED MOON CACTUS' PURPLE
description1: This grafted cactus displays a stunning purple hue on its crown.
description2: A popular choice for adding a splash of color to any cactus collection.

name: MAMMILLOYDIA CANDIDA 'SNOWBALL CACTUS'
description1: Named for its snowball-like appearance, this cactus has a soft white texture.
description2: An attractive plant that looks great on windowsills or in small pots.

name: MAMMILLARIA GRACILIS FRAGILIS 'THIMBLE CACTUS'
description1: The thimble cactus is known for its miniature size and white spines.
description2: An easy-care cactus that spreads with small offsets over time.

name: OPUNTIA MICRODASYS VAR. ALBOSPINA 'WHITE BUNNY EARS'
description1: With its white, fluffy 'ears,' this cactus mimics the look of a bunny.
description2: Ideal for those looking for a playful yet easy-to-grow cactus.

name: MAMMILLARIA GLASSII 'DULCES NOMBRES'
description1: A small cactus with delicate pink flowers and densely packed spines.
description2: Perfect for adding color to small succulent displays.

name: TEPHROCACTUS ARTICULATUS VAR. INERMIS 'PINE CONE CACTUS'
description1: With segments resembling pine cones, this cactus has a unique structure.
description2: Easy to propagate as it grows new sections over time.

name: MAMMILLARIA SCHIEDEANA
description1: Characterized by its tiny, clustered stems and white spines.
description2: A charming, low-water cactus that blooms with small white flowers.

name: CEREUS PERUVIANUS MONSTROSE
description: A unique cactus with twisted, irregular forms, making it a standout in any collection.Known for its dramatic shape and hardy nature, this cactus adds intrigue and beauty.

name: TEPHROCACTUS ARTICULATUS VAR. PAPYRACANTHUS 'PAPER SPINE CACTUS'
description: Named for its paper-thin spines, this cactus has a soft, architectural appearance.Perfect for minimalist decor, this cactus thrives in bright, indirect sunlight.

name: OPUNTIA MONACANTHA VARIEGATA 'VARIEGATED JOSEPH'S COAT'
description: With striking variegated pads, this cactus has a colorful, eye-catching appeal.Easy to care for, the Variegated Joseph’s Coat adds a pop of color to any cactus garden.

name: MAMMILLARIA POLYTHELE 'TOLUCA'
description: This beautiful cactus features delicate spines and a symmetrical, rounded shape.A resilient species, perfect for beginners and cacti collectors alike.

name: MAMMILLARIA GRACILIS 'ORUGA' GRAFTED
description: A grafted cactus with slender, cylindrical segments for a unique aesthetic.Great for indoor and outdoor displays, this cactus is low-maintenance and drought-resistant.

name: ASTROPHYTUM CAPRICORNE 'GOAT'S HORN CACTUS'
description: Named for its horn-like spines, this cactus is known for its exotic and striking look.A popular choice among collectors, it flourishes with bright sunlight and minimal watering.

name: OREOCEREUS TROLLII 'OLD MAN OF THE ANDES'
description: Covered in white woolly hairs, this cactus is reminiscent of the Andes mountains.A hardy cactus that can withstand cool temperatures and adds texture to any arrangement.

name: MAMMILLARIA ELONGATA 'LADYFINGER CACTUS'
description: Named for its finger-like stems, this cactus is both attractive and easy to grow.Perfect for hanging pots, as its delicate stems cascade over the edge gracefully.

name: OPUNTIA MICRODASYS VAR. PALLIDA 'BUNNY EARS'
description: The Bunny Ears cactus has charming, pad-like segments that resemble rabbit ears.Great for beginners, this cactus has low water needs and adds character to any space.

name: CEREUS REPANDUS F. MONSTROSUS 'PETRA'
description: A twisted, mutant form of the Cereus cactus with an otherworldly appearance.Ideal for cactus enthusiasts looking for unique and unusual plants.

name: MAMMILLARIA RHODANTHA SSP. PRINGLEI
description: A colorful cactus with reddish spines that form a beautiful contrast.Perfect for bright windowsills, it’s both decorative and low-maintenance.

name: STENOCEREUS HOLLIANUS F. CRISTATA
description: This crested cactus has unusual, fan-like formations, adding visual interest to any collection.Thrives in full sun and makes a fascinating centerpiece with its unique shape.

name: MAMMILLARIA SPINOSISSIMA 'RED-HEADED IRISHMAN'
description: Easily recognized by its dense spines and red-tipped color, this cactus is eye-catching.An ideal choice for sunny spots, it brings vibrant color to any space.

name: PARODIA SCOPA 'SILVER BALL CACTUS'
description: A spherical cactus with a soft silver appearance and golden spines.This low-maintenance cactus is perfect for beginners and brightens up any setting.

name: MAMMILLARIA ELONGATA 'COPPER KING'
description: Known for its copper-toned spines, this cactus is both decorative and easy to care for.A great choice for indoor cactus gardens, adding warmth and texture to the display.
